text: The 2019 FIBA U18 European Championship Division B is the 15th edition of the Division B of FIBA U18 European Championship. The competition takes place in Oradea, from 26 July to 4 August 2019. ==Participating teams== * * * * (16th place, 2018 FIBA U18 European Championship Division A) * * * * * * * * (3rd place, 2018 FIBA U18 European Championship Division C) * * (winners, 2018 FIBA U18 European Championship Division C) * * * * * * * * * * (15th place, 2018 FIBA U18 European Championship Division A) ==Group phase== In this round, the 24 teams are allocated in four groups of six teams each.
